amendment.description: To rename the Navy and Marine Corps Reserve Center at Rock Island, Illinois, in honor of Representative Lane Evans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4364 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4364 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S6377-6392) To rename the Navy and Marine Corps Reserve Center at Rock Island, Illinois, in honor of Representative Lane Evans.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4364 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Durbin.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4364 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
